title: Covering Recovery: Preparing for Major Disasters
description: The article discusses the challenges of preparing for major disasters, including funding cuts for hospital and public health preparedness, inadequate planning for vulnerable populations, and the need for better coordination among agencies. It also highlights the importance of measuring recovery and finding meaningful personal stories in the aftermath of a disaster.
